title: Einstein warped-product manifolds and the screened Poisson equation
authors:
Alexander Pigazzini, Luca Lussardi, Magdalena Toda, Andrew
  DeBenedictis
abstract:
We study a particular type of Einstein warped-product manifold where the
warping function must satisfy the homogeneous version of the screened Poisson
equation. Under these assumptions, we show that the dimension of the manifold,
the (constant negative) Ricci curvature and the screened parameter are related
through a quadratic equation.
